title: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
OB: When using the 'Add Import' feature with trailing whitespace in the selected text, nothing happens.
EB: The 'Add Import' feature should recognize and ignore leading/trailing whitespace in the selected text, allowing the import to be added successfully.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Select a piece of code with trailing whitespace. 
2. Use the keyboard shortcut 'Ctrl+M' or the 'Add Import' option from the context menu. 
Expected result: The import is added to the appropriate location, ignoring the trailing whitespace within the selection.
